Model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    This class models a "player" in the Monopoly game. A player has available money, and lot sof attributes that corrospond with a player in a real monopoly game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(String name)
      A player is constructed with a name.

      • addMoney

        public void addMoney(int money)
        Add a set amount of money to a player.
        Parameters:
        money - amount to add to player. Can be negative to subtract!

      • setLastAction

        public void setLastAction(String lastAction)
        Sets the text that pops up as a chance card for the player as a log of actions. Should be used to add log items. Therefore the previous action are supplied in addition to new actions.
        Parameters:
        lastAction - text to log user actions

      • toString

        public String toString()
        This returns all actions as a log of the players action.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        log of all player actions as a long string

        public boolean isLucky()
        Used to determine if a player was able to luck themselves out of jail by throwing 2 identical dice

        boolean whether or not they were able to throw identical dice
